name: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition
summary: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition presents a savagely funny world of procedurally-generated stealth and survival. Roam wild in spooky British landscapes, all the while being hunted by a menagerie of bloodthirsty robots. A beautifully remastered new edition of the cult survival game.

name: Sinister Remains
summary: In the shadow of a curse that has endured for decades, explore a town haunted by twisted truths and terrifying events. As you search for the remnants of the past, you’ll uncover the darkness around you and within yourself.

name: Sinner's Verdict
summary: In Sinners Verdict you play as an Inquisitor who must hunt down and banish sinners and perform Justice. Acquire new movement tools on your quest to find the biggest sinner deep within the castle.

name: Silent Anomalies
summary: Silent Anomalies is an intense surveillance simulator. You are a monitoring operator whose job is to find anomalies. Switch cameras, analyze changes, and detect things that look strange or out of place.

name: Simple Hats
summary:
Simple Hats is a JSON-configurable cosmetic hat mod that allows users to define their own hats with various additional options such as variants, dye-ability, particle effects, and seasonality.

There are almost 300 custom hats included in the mod by default that users can add/remove/change as they like.

name: Silent Shadow
summary:
Vertical shoot'em up game where your objective is to clear a path through the multitudes of defences , enabling your Forces Bomber to attack and destroy the enemy airbase through four stages.

The game allows up to two simultaneous players to play collaboratively in two silent shadow fighters.

name: Sicari 2: The Brink of Time
summary:
A complete overhaul of SMW, set in an original universe!
Two main playable characters, Sicari and K-16, each with their own playstyle.
Seven unique bosses.
Tons of unique level themes, complete with entirely original graphics.
Six main worlds, a secret world, and a special world!
46 exits!

name: Sinja UnityStory
summary: A strategy RPG game where you choose a companion character from the selection room, level up, and defeat enemy forces in each stage (scene), with each character having their own unique skills and form, and level up in a different strategic way.

name: SimTower
summary: Welcome to the building simulation game SimTower, which offers the chance to build and manage all the complex, interconnected operations of a modern skycraper. You build your empire from nothing and become the engineer and general manager of your structure. You can provide offices, coffee shops or apartments to anyone who is willing to pay.

name: Simpwalk
summary: A very short, 2D side-scroller collect-a-thon game that lets you play as the cute HOLORO mascots!

name: Siaty's Return
summary: A challenging slow-paced bossgame inspired by both solo games and MMOs, featuring an innovative combination-based gameplay. Combine the three Facets of destruction, resilience and movement into powerful abilities to defeat your corrupted creations.

name: Simple 1500 Series Hello Kitty Vol. 03: Hello Kitty Block Kuzushi
summary:
Simple 1500 Series Hello Kitty vol.3 Hello Kitty Block Kuzushi is a classic breakout game, in the style of the classic arcade game Arkanoid, in which the player controls hello kitty and has to destroy all the bricks in each level to advance to the next one. There are special bricks like in Arkanoid that allow the player to use speciall attack in the ball, like the slow effect, the fast attack, etc.

The game got different levels depending of the player choices (in one you go through levels of letter C and in other in levels of letter B for example), each letter is divided into 5 different brick levels. After passing a level the player unlock a picture that he can later colour in the album mode.

name: Sinister Sodies
summary: Sinister Sodies is a bite-sized arcade puzzle game where you must strategically box in mischievous frooblies to cleanse your carbonated concoction before time runs out.

name: Sibling Souls
summary: Year 2147: In a city where androids and vampires rule, you're caught in the crossfire. Searching for your lost twin, who will you trust—and what are you willing to sacrifice? Every choice shapes your fate—for better or worse—in this dark visual novel.

name: Simple Rockets
summary: SimpleRockets was released in 2013 for mobile and a ton of work was put into getting it ready for PC and Mac. It was inspired by KSP, and it offers a simpler 2D experience for building rockets and exploring space with realistic orbital mechanics.

name: Sift Heads 2
summary: A stickman sniper game following Vinnie as he completes various missions he is tasked with

name: Simpler Times
summary: Simpler Times is an experiential, interactive meditation that rewards patience and attention with poignant moments that can be replayed like a favorite song.

name: Single Forever
summary: "This is not a dating sim."You play as Red, an intern Cupid on the verge of losing both your job and your life. Your mission? Help Lia, a 29-year-old romance rookie, find her first love. Can you survive this near-impossible challenge?

name: SingFever: Your Sing Game
summary: SingFever: Your Voice, Your Stage! Turn every moment into a karaoke party with SingFever, the ultimate singing game! Featuring a massive song library, dynamic gameplay modes, and real-time scoring. Grab the mic, hit the notes, and let the fever take over! Sing Forever = Sing over 26000 Songs

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Minor Factions
summary: Add a whole new strategic dimension with the Minor Factions DLC! Compete against your enemies to exert control over upstart forces that have emerged outside the boundaries of the great powers.

name: Silver Island
summary: The hood has been infested with a plague of creeps and uglies. Zombies ate your cat and you're out for revenge. However, what started as a simple mission to bludgeon, dismember and hack to pieces the hordes of hell unfolds into an epic quest through the slums, graveyards, 99-cent stores, whorehouses and polluted lakes of Silver island in search of more than just the asshole zombie that ate your cat.

name: Singou Breaka
summary: Look carefully at the red and blue signals, and DESTROY them. It's an eccentric action puzzle game where you destroy blocks modeled after pedestrian traffic lights.

name: Silver Pines
summary: Silver Pines is a survival horror metroidvania. Fight nightmarish terrors and solve puzzles, while carefully managing your scarce resources as you uncover the mysteries of a case that could hold the key to redemption.

name: Sign Off
summary: Money, Ammo, Power-ups!

name: Side Kicks! Beyond
summary: An expanded port of Side Kicks! for Nintendo Switch, Android, and iOS that will add new episodes to the main story of Side Kicks!, as well as a crossover episode with BUSTAFELLOWS, which is set in the same world.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 76: The Hanasou Eigo no Tabi
summary: The Hanasou Eigo no Tabi is an educational quiz game in which the player is a japanese tourist (there is the choice to be a boy or a girl at the beginning of the game) that travels to the United States for the first time. In the game the player is supposed to stay for a week in a certain town, in which he will have to communicate in English with the town people and that will deep the friendship while puzzled about cross-cultural questions and memories.

name: SingStar: Singalong with Disney
summary:
SingStar Singalong with Disney is a karaoke game featuring the most famous hits from Disney movies, from Tarzan to Sleeping Beauty without forgetting Aladdin or Peter Pan.

The game gives points which are distributed by the purity of singing, as in how well does one manage to stay on tune. It doesn't matter if you change octaves in the middle of the song or what words are you singing in (it doesn't have a word recognition), so your singing is rated by how well you manage to hit the correct note at the correct time

name: Sime Is Back 18+
summary: Explore a mysterious world hub temple and travel to different worlds, collect shiny diamonds and keys, and unlock new levels packed with that nostalgic charm you’ve come to love. It’s everything you’d expect from a fun, lighthearted 3D platformer… Until it isn’t.

name: Singled Out
summary: In Singled Out you must identify your target in a crowd of alien weirdos before time runs out. The quicker you are, the higher you score!

name: Silent Hill Exotica
summary: Silent Hill Exotica is a mod for the Xbox version for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City that is based on the Silent Hill series. The mod was considered lost media for years, often times just being considered a myth, until it later resurfaced in 2023.

name: Sinister Halloween
summary: Experience Halloween Horror in VR. You go out with your friends, trick or treating, entering haunted attractions, as you make your way to the big party, but this year's holiday of the afterlife brings something sinister.

name: SimCity 4: Deluxe Edition
summary: SimCity 4 Deluxe Edition includes the bestselling SimCity 4 and the all-new SimCity 4 Rush Hour Expansion Pack. Create the most massive region of cities ever, with a farming town, bedroom community, high-tech commercial center, and industrial backbone.

name: Siege - Battle of Ashington
summary:
ched a dangerous oath with the ancient wizarding people, and finally sealed the Skeleton King. 
The war had ended and humans began to rebuild the world order. 
Humans and wizards are constantly in conflict for their own benefit. In the end, Humans violated the ancient oath. The wizarding people were driven away from the land, and they unseal the Skeleton King as a revenge against humanity. 
The re-awakening Skeleton King, with more powerful dark forces, is preparing to attack the frontline walls of mankind. Now you need to be a warrior to stand up and fight...

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 23: Project Minerva Professional
summary:
Using a variety of weapons classes you must progress through many varied missions, using your squad members to scout ahead, bomb targets, rescue hostages and ultimately defeat your enemy and free the world.

Gain cash and experience by defeating your enemies. Use this to improve your arsenal, level up your squad and unlock new items to help in your mission.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 4: The Reversi
summary: Reversi (also marketed by Pressman under the trade name Othello) is a board game involving abstract strategy and played by two players on a board with 8 rows and 8 columns and a set of distinct pieces for each side. Pieces typically are disks with a light and a dark face, each side belonging to one player. The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible.

name: Six Hours at Hugo's
summary:
You are an unemployed college junior who is strapped for cash. While browsing the Yellow Pages, you notice an ad for a night watchman position at Hugo's Hole in the Wall. It looks simple enough, and you could definitely use the money. You decide to give them a call and see when you can start.
Little do you know what awaits...

name: Siren Head: Awakening
summary: Siren Head: Awakening is a first-person horror game based on Trevor Henderson's artwork. You're stuck with your car in the middle of a dark forest with nothing but your flashlight. Seek escape by finding items necessary to survive while a terrifying monster lurks the shadows.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 11: Wandaba Style - Totsugeki! Mix Live Juice
summary: Wandaba Style - Totsugeki! Mix Ki Juice is a music game with some adventure parts in which the story takes part, but the gameplay in the game are in the 15 songs parts in which the player to advance in the story has to make a good performance.

name: Sinjid: Shadow of the Warrior
summary: Sinjid Shadow of the Warrior is the second game in the Sinjid series. It is a role-playing game, where the players take control of the eponymous protagonist, Sinjid.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Gold Edition
summary:
This release includes:

- Civilization IV
- Civilization IV: Warlords
- An exclusive fantasy-style poster from world-famous artist Greg Hildebrandt
- Behind-the-scenes DVD with developer interviews
- Tech-tree poster
- Civilization IV game manual

name: Simpli Casa
summary: Welcome to Simpli Casa, the chill and addictive decorating game where minimalism meets maximum style!

name: SimCity 2000
summary:
It has all the features, flexibility, art, animation, and power you need to create an environment of your dreams. Choose from a selection of bonus cities and scenarios to rule or ruin as you please. Build schools, libraries, hospitals, zoos, prisons, power plants, and much more... Lay down roads, railways, and highways. Explore the underground layer and build subways and utilities without compromising your aesthetics. Customize different buildings or design your own graphics sets from scratch.

This is the ultimate classic Maxis city-building and management simulation. If this game were any more realistic, it'd be illegal to turn it off!

name: Sineus Arena
summary: Power up heroes in co-op or solo as you battle endless hordes in a roguelite bullet hell base-building run. Build a shared stronghold, face the final boss, and see how long you survive!

name: Siege of Shadowdale: Enhanced Edition
summary: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. This new version features rewritten and expanded dialogue, new quests, new areas to explore, and the addition of several henchmen, as well as a new world map and completely overhauled graphics.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail
summary: Sixtar Gate: Startrail is a rhythm game for keyboard set against a space exploration backdrop. Captain your science vessel alongside your navigator Shii as you explore the vast Sixtar system!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization II: Fantastic Worlds
summary: An expansion pack to Sid Meier's Civilization II, introducing several less-realistic elements such as dragons. Its content was folded into Sid Meier's Civilization II Multiplayer Gold Edition.

name: Sinking Simulator
summary: The sequel to the unfinished Sinking Simulator, now with a lot more POWER!!!! Witness your witty love of chaos and destruction sinking 2D ships and everything else on board!

name: Silent Edge
summary: Silent Edge is a top-down 3D samurai action game with simple, beginner-friendly controls. Slash, dodge, and fire ranged techniques as you clear stylish feudal stages and tense boss battles, with sharp combat and a quiet, atmospheric presentation.

name: Sigma Star Saga DX
summary: An updated re-release of Sigma Star Saga, which adds an improved map, decreased random encounter rate, rebalanced EXP system, updated script, various bug fixes, and other enhancements.

name: Sinbadexpress
summary: Sinbadexpress virtual universe is a virtual gaming platform that works in the marketplace logic that brings buyers and sellers together.

name: Sisters Royale: Five Sisters Under Fire
summary:
Sparks flare around the man all five sisters wish to claim. Introducing the new vertical scrolling shooter game!

The first new game in 12 years from Alfa System, the team that brought you.the Shoot 'Em Up "Castle of Shikigami III" in the "Castle of Shikigami" series.

Five uniquely talented sisters are squabbling over which of them will marry the angel Yashin. Enjoy the heroic(?) strategies of all five!

The Tension Bonus System (TBS) means your score and number of coins multiplies based on your distance from enemies and their attacks, and the Powershot System changes normal attacks into strong attacks, further ramping up the tension!

Plus, once the TBS has multiplied by two within a certain time, Secret Fairies will be hidden somewhere in stages for you to find.

Master these systems and set new high scores!

name: Since 1935
summary: This is an interactive narrative inspired by real events. Experience the untold story of an ordinary woman in contemporary China, blending heartfelt storytelling and light puzzles to explore resilience and humanity throughout her life journey.

name: Silhouette Mirage
summary: Silhouette Mirage is a side-scrolling action game. The basic gameplay is somewhat similar to that of Gunstar Heroes. The game's standout feature is the concept of the two attributes. Depending on the enemy's attributes and the type of attack used by Shyna, damage can be increased, and spirit (equivalent to magic power) can be absorbed from enemies. Shyna can dash, jump, crouch, slide, and grab enemies, executing combo attacks. It is also possible to master moves, acquire money, and purchase special creatures called "parasites", which teach Shyna various types of attacks.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Crossroads of the World Collection - Wonder Pack
summary: Explore more possibilities for your personalized empire with four new Natural Wonders: Machapuchare, Mount Fuji, Vihren, and Vinicunca!

name: Silence Channel 2
summary:
We always search for truth while awake, but truth can be found in our nightmares…
Experience the terror in Silence Channel 2, a first person horror game based on a true story. Navigate through eerie environments, solve puzzles, evade lurking horrors, and even wield firepower in a desperate bid for survival. Can you escape the relentless darkness in this terrifying sequel?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Complete Edition
summary: Sid Meier’s Civilization is widely recognized as one the greatest PC game franchises of all-time. Heralded as one of the top ten games of 2005, Civilization IV is a must-have for gamers around the globe. Sid Meier’s Civilization IV: The Complete Edition includes Civilization IV, plus all three expansions: Warlords, Beyond the Sword and Colonization.

name: SimuLadron
summary:
In SimuLadron, your mission is simple: fire up the money printer and keep the country “running.”
Use the glorious machinery of the State to print bills, promise impossible subsidies, and watch inflation skyrocket faster than your approval ratings.

name: SimCity Classic
summary: SimCity Classic was the later shared name for the enhanced rereleases of SimCity for Windows 3.x, OS/2 Warp and Macintosh, built around their window systems.

name: Sinkr 3
summary: Sinkr 3 is the culmination of the award winning minimalist puzzler series. SiNKR 3 offers a new slant on the familiar contraptions with new diagonal layouts and billiards-style physics. BY PLAYER DEMAND: multi-step undo.

name: Sil and the Fading World
summary: Battle against fearsome Raidbosses alone! Uncover your past in Aritas, a sinister world ravaged by ancient Gods of the Realm Below. This ARPG features 9 class specializations, hundreds of unique items, a vast array of skills, complex character progression, and intense Raidboss encounters.

name: Silent Hill: Play Novel
summary: Silent Hill: Play Novel is an adaptation of the original Silent Hill for Game Boy Advance in the form of visual novel. It was only released in Japan, but the game has been translated and adapted into different ports by fans. Silent Hill: Play Novel is an interactive story: at certain moments the player is asked to choose between two or more possible options, which can affect the rest of the story. Besides the narration, the game features some puzzles and multiple endings.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Iceland Pack
summary: The Iceland civilization for the Exploration Age is now available in Sid Meier's Civilization VII!

name: Silent Hill Demake
summary: A complete game boy color demake of the PS1 classic Silent Hill.

name: Siralim
summary: Siralim is a deep RPG with light roguelike elements that allows you to summon and customize hundreds of creatures to fight in strategic battle. Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons and complete randomized quests. Find rare treasure and use it to upgrade your castle, empower your creatures, craft powerful artifacts, learn new spells, and much more.

name: Siete Olas
summary:
In the night of San Juan, as the tradition goes, you must jump seven waves

Midnight has arrived and you're at the shore.

name: Siren Head Horror Bunker VR
summary: Siren Head Horror Bunker VR is a survival horror game with the sole objective of escaping an old abandoned bunker where the scary monster Siren Head lurks, you must explore, collect items and solve puzzles to survive and escape.

name: Sisyphus
summary: Sisyphus is a music rhythm game in which players control Sisyphus to kick out rocks to the rhythm.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Dystopia Pack
summary: Meet 「Dystopia」: the DLC of 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」! This DLC contains 8 new songs.

name: Sister Other Paranoia
summary: A dark visual novel created by the team behind NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE. Overly sensitive to other people's emotions, the protagonist—a light novel writer—develops the ability to read minds, only to be driven even deeper into isolation. His sole remaining comfort is his younger sister, gifted yet lonely.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 15: The Pachinko
summary:
With 3 types of original pachinko machines, this game delivers a real sense of playing inside a pachinko parlour.
The 3 pachinko machines available are "CR Love Love Project 2", a LCD machine offering diversified reach actions, "CR Star Robot" with heated double and triple reach actions, and "Surfing Island", a colourful machine in the motif of aloha T-shirts.

name: Siren Head: The Horror Experience
summary:
While working the late shift at the Police Department, you receive a report about some teenagers that went missing in Windermere Woods. Old folk tales mention these woods, and of a monster that is said to lurk there, but those are just stories... right?

It is your job to find these teens, but you did not imagine the horrors you would face.
The old folks tale states that the mythical monster surrounds its habitat with siren noises of all kinds, luring unsuspecting victims.

name: Siegecraft Commander
summary:
Create the ultimate fortress and wreak havoc, raining destruction on your enemies with catapult-flinging fun!

Siegecraft Commander offers a real-time strategy (RTS) single-player campaign, while providing both turn-based and RTS options for high-stakes multiplayer matches!

In turn-based matches, plan the location of the towers, units and walls in your fortress to outmaneuver your foes, then tactically think and precisely aim when starting your attack! In real-time, quickly construct a base that can win the war and start an all-out offensive. Both offer easy-to-learn strategic elements combined in subtle ways to yield a rich tactical experience!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Cradle of Civilization Map Pack - Asia
summary: The Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Asia includes a single-player map based on the historical regions of Asia, featuring key river valleys such as the Yellow River and Yangtze River. The map is designed to reflect the geographic and cultural landscape of early Asian civilizations. Players can select random leaders or those appropriate to the region's history. The map can also be used in the World Builder tool for custom scenarios.

name: SimpleRoad
summary: A car driving simulation. Drive until you reach the end of the long road.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 36: The Renai Simulation - Natsu-iro Celebration
summary:
The Renai Simulation: Natsu-iro Celebration is a classic adventure dating simulation game.

The game begins at the beginning of august when Kimi is a young student receive a call from her father telling her to return to home in 21 days. So she decided to enjoy those days having fun with her classmate friend. They will go around the town and meet different people.

Everytime that the game is played the personality of the people changed making each time a different experience for the player. The game features 11 different main characters to interact.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: New Frontier Pass
summary: Continue your quest to build your greatest empire with the Civilization VI - New Frontier Pass, featuring eight new civilizations and nine new leaders, and a variety of new gameplay content, including six new game modes.

name: Silversoul Orphanage
summary: Silversoul Orphanage is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation. A VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with subtle scares, focusing on the feeling of being stalked during an urban exploration.

name: Sift Heads 1: Remasterized
summary: We brought back the one of the first classic shooter game: Sift Heads 1. All the missions we loved but now remasterized with cool music and more intense action game play! Plunge into memory lane and enjoy this bloody new remake.

name: Silent Road
summary: Drive through Japan’s suicide ring in your night-shift taxi. Pick up strange passengers, fulfill their unsettling requests and follow the silent road as their stories make each ride darker than the last.

name: Silver Screen Story
summary: Become the boss of film studios and lead them to world-wide fame, supervising production of blockbusters! Customize your studios with facilities such as a CG or sound studio, staff cafeteria or acting school. Having talented directors is key, but it's up to you to train them up, bring out their full potential, and offer them guidance when they get stuck. Hire actors, or have famous pop icons, dancers, or comedians star in your films. Have fun with tons of possibilities picking the genre, themes, and filming location for your movies! Produce smash hits to win fans all over the world and break all box office records! Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games!!

name: Simple RTS
summary:
A Simple Real-Time-Strategy Game Like in the good old days, with 20 types of units. 
The goal is simply to conquer all territories on the map, which is also your AI opponent's goal...

name: Simulacrum
summary: Swing through abstract dreams and blow through hordes of enemies at breakneck speed. A first person aerial movement shooter.

name: Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death
summary: Meet Sir Whoopass, the hero who due to a series of hilarious and poor life choices manages to bring chaos and disarray to an utopian world. He must find The Villain-Beating Artifact to vanquish The Immortal and stop him from spawning all manner of evil monsters and creatures. Also cheese.

name: SimCity 4: Rush Hour
summary:
Rush Hour is the first expansion pack for SimCity 4.

This expasion allows you to take complete control of your city by allowing you to jump directly into the action. You can take control of a speedboat and chase criminals through your canals, you can take your Sims on a tourist ride by hopping into the engineer's booth of a train, you can track down criminals in a police car, being sure to avoid traffic, you can call in the heavy artillery and take control of your army's tank, or you can please the populace by taking control of a single engine plane and and impress everyone with skywriting.

name: Silicon Dreams - Snowball
summary:
Plot 
 
As the Snowball 9 approaches Eden, something goes wrong. A crew member murders her shipmates, destroys the communication system and sets the ship on a collision course with the sun. The robots, being little more than automata, continue their everyday operations oblivious to the danger but the ship's computer, capable of thinking, awakens Kim Kimberley before the deranged crew member destroys it. She exits her modified stasis chamber with the goal of finding a way to reach the control room and avert disaster. 
Development 
 
Snowball was originally released during 1983 as the company's fourth adventure game using the A-Code system.[1] Nick, Mike, and Pete Austin headed development. Though Level 9's previous games featured a fantasy theme, the Austin brothers chose a science fiction theme.[5] The original release used version 1 of this system[6] and was initially released only for the BBC Micro, Sinclair ZX Spectrum and Nascom,[7] but was later followed by versions for the Commodore 64, Camputers Lynx, Oric-1, Atari 8-bit[8] as well as for the Memotech MTX, Amstrad CPC, Enterprise and MSX.[9] It is noteworthy for including over seven thousand locations. To achieve this sixty-eight hundred locations on the passenger disks form a colour-coded maze with minimal descriptions. 
 
Another peculiar aspect of the game was the confusion behind the main character's gender. In an interview for Sinclair User, Chris Bourne asked, "Is the androgynous Kim a man or woman?" Pete Austin pointed out that "there's a credit at the end for the design of 'Ms Kimberley's costume,' " but also admitted that Kim Kimberley was "a deliberately unisex name." The debate came to an end with the release of Return to Eden, where it was made more explicit that Kim was not a man, because the surviving crew members confuse her with the woman who tried to destroy the ship.

name: Silhouette
summary: Silhouette is a cozy puzzle VR game that tasks the player with helping little shadow creatures (the Shadowies) through 28 puzzles. It uses hand tracking (no controllers) to let you cast shadows, manipulate the Shadowie's environment and interact with objects.

name: Siege 'n Sow
summary: Unleash strategic mastery in this minimalist real-time strategy game. Micromanage units, expand territory, and fend off night attacks. Harvest resources, build structures, and command diverse units to survive relentless waves. Will you triumph or succumb to the shadows?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Civ and Scenario Pack - Denmark (The Vikings)
summary: The Denmark Civilization and Scenario Pack brings you both the Denmark Civilization and the new Scenario, 1066: Year of Viking Destiny, to further enhance your Civilization V experience. Rule the world as Harald Bluetooth, with your powerful Berserker warriors and Ski Infantry!

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: Play for Canada
summary: DLS gives the opportunity to play for Canada

name: Sinjid: Battle Arena
summary: Sinjid: Battle Arena is the first game in the Sinjid series. It is a role-playing action-adventure game made for flash. It has a turn based battle system.

name: SiN Multiplayer
summary:
SiN Multiplayer is the separate multiplayer launcher for SiN on Steam, updated to use Steam's server browser. 
 
It was included alongside SiN with SiN Episodes: Emergence when it was released on Steam in 2006. 
It was removed from Steam, but was still playable if already installed, ahead of the updated release of SiN Gold on Steam in 2020.

name: Signs of the Sojourner
summary: Signs of the Sojourner is a narrative deck-building game about relationships and communication. As you explore the world your experiences will change you. How will you grow? What will you leave behind? Who will you become?

name: Silken Shaft
summary: Climb up the sky-piercing tower and ascend towards space! Upgrade your moves and conquer the tower with your own unique build! Rogue-like × Climbing action game.

name: Sinsations
summary: In Sinsations, a BL / Yaoi Visual Novel, you play as Kosuke, Lucifer's newest Deadly Sin of Lust. Kosuke has to seduce all 6 of the other Deadly Sins to prove to Lucifer he's up to the challenge! Numerous ends, hundreds of backgrounds and CGs, and full voice acting!

name: Siren Head: The Arrival
summary: Siren Head: The Arrival is a horror mod for Minecraft which adds in Trevor Henderson's iconic monster "Siren Head" into the game. During regular gameplay, Siren Head roams around the world and stalks the player. Watch out, you may hear him before you see him.

name: Sin Cards: Welcome to the Netherworld
summary: SIN CARDS is a horror deckbuilder where every card brings you closer to salvation or damnation. Face terrifying demons, uncover dark lore, and survive a world of permadeath where every choice could be your last.

name: Sifting Thyme
summary:
You’re the newest transfer student at Lincoln Culinary Academy, a private culinary school and the perfect start to your path towards finding your culinary calling. Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of food, business, and innovation throughout your school adventures. But you’re definitely not alone in this journey, as four gorgeous guys with culinary skills of their own await you to make your experience at Lincoln worthwhile.

Together, you will explore the world of food to forge relationships, engage new challenges, and aspire to make each other’s gourmet dreams come true.

An otome romance visual novel with unforgettable characters and adventures, and a perfectly delectable story for foodies across the globe.

name: Simon
summary: This is a version of the electronic game of the same name. The game creates a series of tones and lights and requires a user to repeat the sequence. If the user succeeds, the series becomes progressively longer and more complex.

name: Side Eye High
summary: Investigate student deaths inside a 1997 American high school. Inspect everything, collect evidence, and piece together what happened in a grounded point-and-click detective mystery.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Pocotone Pack
summary: Meet the collaboration pack between 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」 and AfreecaTV's virtual BJ crew 'POKOTONE'! This DLC includes a total of 10 new songs and 9 new emotes.

name: Silent Frontiers
summary: A Gripping 2D Side-Scrolling Strategy Tower Defense Extravaganza. In this forgotten frontier, you become the final line of defense for your city, warding off relentless hordes of monstrous invaders. This is not just a battle for survival; it's a supreme test of wit and strategy.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Ashoka (World Conqueror) Persona
summary: Enjoy an alternate persona for the Civilization VII base game leader Ashoka with his World Conqueror Persona!* This persona includes a unique outfit and background for Ashoka, plus a new Unique Ability and Agenda that reflect a different side of his personality!

name: Side Swipe
summary: A minimalist reflex game for touch screen devices.

name: Silvanis
summary: A psychological thriller, story-driven experience. Venture into the mysterious forest to find your missing daughter; unsolved puzzles, a dark atmosphere filled with whispers, and unsettling sounds await you...

name: Sing 4: The Hits Edition
summary: Sing 4: The Hits Edition is a unique singing game unlike any other. This is the first game with high-precision lyrics scoring that detects humming vs. singing, and includes cool effects like pitch correction to enhance your voice with. Sing 4 is sure to be a fun game for the whole family, allowing up to 4 players to sing simultaneously.

name: Since Memories: Off the Starry Sky - Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition contains:

- SINce Memories: Off the Starry Sky game
- Art book
- Soundtrack CD

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 37: The Illust Puzzle & Slide Puzzle
summary: Big collection of illustration and slide puzzles for the player to choose and solve. Up to 2 players to play at the same time. There are more than 500 illustration puzzles and more than 100 slide puzzles.

name: Silent Woods
summary: Silent Woods blends survival, open-world exploration and a deep crafting system to create a heart-pounding experience. How long can you survive in a world where death lurks in every shadow?

name: Silent Whisper
summary: Silent Whisper is a single-player horror game that takes you into an abandoned school with a haunting past. What begins as simple exploration turns into a nightmare. Navigate its decaying halls, uncover dark secrets, and do whatever it takes to escape—or risk becoming another victim.

name: SimRail: The Railway Simulator - Cargo Pack
summary: Lead heavy freight trains with the legendary ET22 locomotive and new wagons. Conquer challenging missions and haul up to 3000 tons across Polish railways!

name: Silicon Warrior
summary:
Make a time journey into the year 2084.

The SYBORGS, a superhuman race of Technocrates, developed a computer of the 10th generation. A computer with more RAM and more artificial intelligence as all other computers built by the mankind.

The SYBORGS swore to tell the secret, which is connected with this computer, to the best and greatest computer developer of the mankind.

The managers of all prominent computer companies sent their best developers to this future war.

They have to fight against each other. One against the other one.

Only the best can experience the secret of the SYBORGS.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Warlords
summary:
Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Warlords is the first expansion pack for the award-winning game that has become an instant world-wide hit. Paying homage to some of history's greatest military leaders, the expansion delivers six unique and interesting scenarios, giving players the chance to change the course of history with the help of their new powerful "warlord" unit. Civ IV: Warlords includes new civilizations, leaders, units, and wonders that offer even more fun and exciting ways for players to expand their civilization's military power as they strive for world domination.

Game scenarios: the expansion delivers eight scenarios.

New civilizations: the pack provides six new civilizations and associated unique units.
Civilization leaders: 10 new leaders, including leaders for the new civilizations as well as additional leaders for existing civilizations.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution 2
summary: The sequel to one of the most successful strategy games on mobile is here! Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution 2 challenges players to build a glorious empire that will stand the test of time. This is the first game in the Civilization catalog to be developed and available exclusively for mobile devices. Civilization Revolution 2 offers mobile strategy fans a brand new 3D presentation and more tactical depth than ever before! Find out if you have what it takes to rule the world!

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 103: The Ganso Densha Utenshi - Densha De Go!
summary:
The player can choose from a variety of tracks and trains and will then have to drive the train to the designated stations while sticking to the tight schedule, stopping exactly at the marked positions, obeying all signs and signals, and ensuring passenger safety and comfort.

Whenever the player makes a mistake, points are deducted from a counter which at the start of each round is initialized to a value depending on the selected difficulty. If it reaches zero, the game is over.

This title features, among others, the Yamanote Line around Tokyo, and parts of the To-kaido- Main Line.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Tides of Power Collection
summary: Explore new possibilities for your personalized empire in Sid Meier's Civilization VII with the post-launch paid add-on content of the Tides of Power Collection!

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 101: The Sentou
summary: In Simple 1500 series vol. 101 the Sentou the player takes the role of a young boy in charge of a bathhouse. Every week the player choose what duties will the boy do (cleaning the baths, rest, repair the ceiling, put more fire to the kettle, etc.) Depending on the jobs, the boy starts will increase or decrease.

name: Simply Sudoku
summary: A simple sudoku game for the Playdate handheld console.

name: Sixteen Undead
summary: Drive Like Hell! A high-octane chase through the endless desert! Dodge cops, rock out and tear up the road as a stitched-up teenage Frankenstein!

name: Silent Reel
summary: A twisted cinema where familiar halls shift each time. Someone may be changing the path. Clues hide in posters, seats, and sounds. Watch closely. Silence, echoes, and the projector’s hum create a tense atmosphere that pulls you in—and keeps you on edge.

name: Silent dream
summary: In the dark corridor as wide as a labyrinth, avoiding numerous pursuers who are aiming for their lives. Will you be able to save the missing person and escape safely!?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Bulgaria Pack
summary: Add the Bulgaria civilization to your collection for The Exploration Age in Sid Meier's Civilization VII!

name: Sip Fisher
summary: Have you ever wanted to drink an entire lake through a straw? Well now you can in this cozy incremental fishing game! There's so much to sip in the lake, so upgrade your straw, drink up schools of fish, and maybe find what's at the bottom of the Lake!

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 105: The Maid Fuku to Kikanjuu
summary: During the dusk of one day, the girl maid Yuuki, who may act reckless at times, was secretly protecting her future master who was returning home from school. This future master was summoned to his grandfather’s villa and found himself facing a large robot army and a man with a hideous face. Faced with so many enemies, Yuuki had to reveal her identity as the secret bodyguard. What is the identity of this master who is attacked by sexy maids and giant robots? And why is that? The key is linked to a certain secret closely related to him…

name: Silent Exterminator
summary: Pest Controller Manfred E. Goron is called to the transportation testing facility in Black Mesa, where a shipment to the Bio-Labs has crashed and 45 headcrabs have escaped. They must be neutralized without harming the staff and since there are more targets than darts in the tranquilizer-gun, the dynamic environment must be used to be more effective.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 70: The Kanshikikan
summary: This simple series game puts the player in the role of a female forensic that has to solve a number of mysteries (10 cases) by heading to the crime scene and collecting evidence and fingerprints which are then handed off to an expert for analysis. Your job is to manage evidence and string together a correct picture of the crime; go off on the wrong path and your superiors will grow angry and take you off the case.

name: Silent Debuggers
summary: Make your way through a dungeon-like space station and defeat the prowling monsters in this real-time first-person shooter. You're a member of the elite Debuggers, a group of warriors who are jacks-of- all-trades. Assigned to inspect an unmanned space station, you have exactly 100 minutes to get in, destroy the monsters lurking in each block, make your way to the lowest level and deactivate the automatic detonator placed there. With each monster that slips by you, the core block becomes harder to survive in, so speed is key in preserving the facility and each separate block. Experience the thrill of survival as the timer ticks away and you uncover the truth of the events that occurred.

name: Silver the Hedgehog: World's Collide
summary: "Silver The Hedgehog: World's Collide" is a 2D fangame that revolves around the character, Silver the Hedgehog, inspired by the game "Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)". In this game you play as Silver the Hedgehog as you try to stop Eggman Nega from taking over the world by utilizing Silver's psychokinesis which you can control using your mouse or mouse pad. You must use Silver's psychokinetic powers to defeat enemies and move around platforms and other objects that will help you progress through the many different levels of the game.

name: Sisyphi
summary: Sisyphi is a casual strategy game about two players (Sisyphus) competing against each other to push their boulder towards the finish line on a map generated based on what the players type.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Founders Edition
summary:
Founders Edition includes:
• Full base game
• Early Access - play the game up to 5 days early on February 6, 2025
• Tecumseh and Shawnee Pack

Crossroads of the World Collection, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders (Ada Lovelace and Simón Bolívar) , 4 new civilizations (Carthage, Great Britain, Nepal, Bulgaria), 4 new Natural Wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and more to be announced.

Right to Rule Collection, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders (Genghis Khan, Lakshmibai), 4 new civilizations (Assyria, Dai Viet, Qajar, Silla), 4 new Wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and additional content to be announced

Deluxe Content Pack, which includes:
2 leader personas (Xerxes, The Achaemenid and Friedrich, Baroque), 4 profile customizations, 1 alternate scout skin
Founders Content Pack, which includes:
2 leader personas (Ashoka, World Conqueror and Himiko, High Shaman), 4 profile customizations, 1 fog of war tile set, 1 Founders palace skin

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Right to Rule Collection
summary:
Explore new possibilities for your personalized empire in Sid Meier's Civilization VII with the post-launch add-on content of the Right to Rule Collection!

Included:
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Genghis Khan Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Dai Viet Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Right to Rule Collection - Wonder Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Assyria Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Right to Rule Collection - Cosmetic Bonus
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Lakshmibai Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Qajar Pack
Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Silla Pack

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Maya & Gran Colombia Pack
summary: This new content pack introduces the Maya civilization, led Lady Six Sky, and the Gran Colombia civilization, led by Simón Bolívar. Also included is the new Apocalypse game mode as well as new City-States, Resources, and Natural Wonders.

name: Silly's Gameshow
summary: Silly's Gameshow is a co-op animatronic horror game. Only one player needs to own the game.

name: Side Pocket
summary: Side Pocket is a pocket billiards video game originally released into arcades by Data East in 1986. The arcade version was eventually ported to six home console platforms and two sequels to the game were produced, as well as a spin-off series called Pocket Gal. G-Mode currently owns the intellectual property rights to the Side Pocket series, and licenses these games globally.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 17: The Suiri - Aratanaru 20 no Jikenbo
Silver Falls: 3 Down Stars
summary: Silver Falls offers a suspenseful, tensely paced Storyline Campaign for players looking for a classic, survival horror challenge. When players want to flex some muscle, the Frontier Fighters game mode features RPG style loot collecting, leveling up, skill customization, and weapon upgrading. This game mode allows the player to play short missions of varying difficulty. These action focused missions let players enjoy short bursts of action for gaming on the go. With a variety of playable characters to unlock, each with unique strengths and skills, players will find hours of thrilling action, fighting back waves of enemies, unlocking more missions, earning unique, legendary weapons, and powering up characters in Frontier Fighters.

name: Sinyaya Boroda
summary: Instead of sunny days, carefree relaxation, and dates, he has a “responsible” task ahead of him — to look after the sinister but seemingly empty mansion of the mysterious, absent owner whom everyone calls Bluebeard. Denis thought it would be easy, watering flowers and bored in silence...

name: SimShock2025
summary: SimShock2025 is a free, bilingual (EN/ES) hemodynamic shock simulator. Treat cardiogenic, hemorrhagic, and septic shock using real drugs and interventions. Written in PureBasic, available for Mac and Windows. Apple-signed and notarized.

name: Silencer
summary: Silencer is a bureaucratic simulation game about censorship and misinformation in journalism and politics. As a low-level news censor employed by the authoritarian government, Ogalia, the player will interpret censorship protocols, read news articles, and decide if an article should be taken down.

name: Sisters Secrecy: Arcanum Bloodlines
summary: For as long as humanity existed, there has been an ancient order which prevented the dark forces from taking over the world. The order's name might have changed as the centuries wore on, but its essence remained the same. They were called "guardians," and our story is about the kids of one particular guardian. One day, fearing for their lives, he left his kids at the doorstep of an orphanage on the other side of the world. This is where our story begins...

name: SimPark
summary: Another of the "spin-offs" in the Sim franchise by Maxis. Aimed moreso at children, SimPark's objective is to cultivate and manage a successful park and could be considered a toned down version of SimIsle.

name: Silent Observer
summary: Every floor is a new world. A first-person psychological horror where every floor is a new nightmare. Travel through chilling environments, unravel disturbing stories as the elevator takes you deeper and deeper into the unknown. Can you make it to the last floor?

name: SinSiege
summary: SinSiege is a action rogue-like/tower defense hybrid set in Hell, where humanity's embassies is under siege. Play as legendary heroes, build divine defenses, and face off against waves of demons corrupted by the Seven Sins in a battle to protect mankind’s final haven in hell.

name: Silent Fangs: Stealthy Vampire's Tale
summary: Silent Fangs is a PS1-style hack ’n slash where a fallen vampire fights through brutal massacres and roams a gothic open world. Rebuild your lost kingdom, uncover its secrets, and meet bizarre allies who mix dark humor with cryptic guidance.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Persia and Macedon Civilization & Scenario Pack
summary: Alexander leads Macedon and Cyrus leads Persia in Sid Meier’s Civilization VI! Macedon’s abilities will let you conquer the whole world, and Persia can grow rich and cultured, or launch surprise invasions with incredible ease.

name: Singstar: Svenska Hits Schlager
summary: SingStar: Svenska Hits Schlager is a karaoke game featuring 30 songs by Swedish artists. There are no changes to the gameplay formula: player(s) sing into a microphone and the game gives points based on the performance. The only basis of assessment is if the correct note is hit with the correct timing; the sung words or octave does not play into the result.

name: Sirens
summary: Become a deadly Siren and hunt down the most dangerous sea creatures that have ever swum in the depths of the oceans! Experience a fascinating journey through the world as seen from the perspective of Sirens at various stages of their evolution.

name: Sinker Sound
summary: a Fishing game with Musical Rhythm gimmick! Explore a Strange Fantastical lake and find many strange fishes with its own unique original music!

name: Silk Road: Legend of Gero
summary: Platform-puzzle doujin game where you control a little monkey girl who pukes on blocks to destroy them.

name: Silent Hill Complete Set
summary:
A collection which was released on Silent Hill movie Japanese premiere's day. The set was a limited edition which was distributed exclusively through the Konamistyle.jp site at the price of 7.400 yen. It includes:
- Silent Hill (PSone Books)
- Silent Hill 2: Saigo no Uta (Konami Palace Selection)
- Silent Hill 3 (Konami Palace Selection)
- Silent Hill 4: The Room (Konami the Best)
- Five postcards in a plastic pouch, one for each game and one for the live action film
- Film postcard of a slightly different format than the others
- Projector light sealed in plastic with a piece of paper

name: SimCity Societies: Destinations
summary: Expansion for SimCity Societies. The main focus of SimCity Societies: Destinations is tourism, with new features that allow players to build tourist destinations. Destinations that can be created by the player include ski resorts, beach resorts, and theme parks. Air travel and water travel have also been introduced to the game, along with an improved map generator.

name: Sinew
summary: Venture into the mysterious, horrid depths of a cold and threatening abyss in this short, dark adventure game. Players assume control of a small, aquatic creature as they must avoid dangers and solve environmental puzzles.

name: Sighchology Research Lab
summary: In this game, you play as a student in the Sighchology Research Lab. In this dark place, you do research every night and day without sleep, because you have been given a great mission: to publish a piece of paper...

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Ada Lovelace Pack
summary: Add the leader Ada Lovelace to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization VII!

name: Siberian Experiment
summary: Abandoned on the edge of the Siberian taiga, an old military barracks holds something more sinister than just memories of the past. A cold wind whispers through the broken windows, carrying the smell of damp and decay through the empty corridors.

name: Sir Lovelot
summary: Sir Lovelot is on a quest to find the love of his life, and only you can help him avoid the cold sting of loneliness (but let’s be real: solitude is great!). Join him in a wacky precision platformer in which he’ll realize that finding love isn’t as easy as he thinks! Collects gifts, avoid treacherous hazards and fight off weird creatures, all in the best possible time! It's an absolutely heartbreaking hairy-tale, if ever there was one...

name: Silmarils Collection
summary: This is a collection of sixteen games presented by DotEmu.

name: Signal Intentions
summary: Observe your surroundings for anomalies, and use your camera to capture them. Unravel the truth behind the disappearance of the employees in a space agency.

name: Signed by '89
summary: Tiny band. Big heart. Huge pixels. Get a record deal by 1989… and save Johnny Gherkin from military school. Mini music management in 64x64 pixel-o-vision.

name: SingStar: Afrikaanse Treffers
summary: Localized release exclusive to South Africa. The game gives points which are distributed by the purity of singing, as in how well does one manage to stay on tune. It doesn't matter if you change octaves in the middle of the song or what words are you singing in (it doesn't have a word recognition), so your singing is rated by how well you manage to hit the correct note at the correct time.

name: Silivri
summary: Silivri City — an open-world co-op game blending absurdity and dark humor! Complete missions, launder money, jump in your car, explore the city, or betray your friend. Every corner is nonsense, every NPC has a story. Your only goal: deliver the laundry... and don’t lose your mind!

name: SimCity
summary: SimCity, later renamed SimCity Classic, is a city-building simulation video game, first released on February 2, 1989, and designed by Will Wright for the Macintosh computer. SimCity was Maxis's second product, which has since been ported into various personal computers and game consoles, and spawned several sequels including SimCity 2000 in 1993, SimCity 3000 in 1999, SimCity 4 in 2003, SimCity DS, SimCity Societies in 2007, and SimCity in 2013. Until the release of The Sims in 2000, the SimCity series was the best-selling line of computer games made by Maxis.

name: Signum Malum
summary:
Trans lesbian bathtime eroge. it gets horny, but it's good clean fun. it's very much 18+

SIGNUM MALUM was made very quickly for Trans Joy Jam 2025 with Super Videotome Modded.

name: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
summary:
FMV (Interactive Movie)

"It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"
Meet Tesu Kang, a simp who's never had a girlfriend in his 30 years. Now facing the harsh reality of aging without any prospects for romance. he realizes that if there's no path, he must forge his own. Determined to find new love through a dating app, Tesu embarks on what could be the biggest challenge of his life.

Join in and see how your choices will change his destiny!

name: Simon The Sorcerer: Origins - Pony DLC
summary: Simon The Sorcerer: Origins - Pony DLC introduces a special portable cassette tape player that allows players to experience Simon's latest adventure while listening to the original soundtrack from the 1993 home computer classic Simon the Sorcerer. This DLC combines retro cassette tape nostalgia with gameplay, bringing the authentic audio experience of the original game into the modern adventure. Players can enjoy the classic soundtrack as they progress through the content, creating a nostalgic audio-visual experience that pays homage to the series' roots.

name: Simon the Sorcerer: Origins - Deluxe DLC
summary: The Deluxe DLC for Simon the Sorcerer: Origins includes two digital content packages. Players receive a digital history artbook featuring the comic-style artwork from the game, providing insight into the visual design and development of the sorcerer's return. The package also contains the complete official soundtrack, offering over 50 minutes of new and rearranged music from the classic Simon the Sorcerer, composed by Mason Fisher.

name: Signal Lost
summary: A short horror game where you keep a spacecraft operational as it reaches Venus by completing tasks and repairs.

name: Silent Earth
summary: Silent Earth is a short sci-fi text adventure about finding one’s place despite an uncertain future. Explore an off-world mining colony ship, navigate multi-linear character relationships, and steer the story toward one of five endings.

name: Silmaris: Dice Kingdom
summary: Turn-based medieval kingdom management game. Roll the dice to rally the monarchs to your kingdom by diplomacy, war or deception.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Simón Bolívar Pack
summary: Add the leader Simón Bolívar to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization VII!

name: Simple Builder
summary: Simple Builder is basically exactly what it's name is a simple building game. You can build a large number of structures and/or large ones and have five save locations to try out. As you build more in each save location your gathering range increases.

name: Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 2
summary:
One week after the eerie events occurred in Silver Creek Falls, the sleepy town in North Carolina is hit with yet another tragedy. An FBI agent is brutally murdered in cold blood in his own bedroom. No one knows who did it or why. Only one thing is clear: something truly sinister is broiling in Silver Creek Falls.

Play as Boston-born detective Sara Fitzgerald, as she continues her investigation of this creepy town and unfurls a plot far more convoluted and intricate than she could ever imagine!

name: #SinucaAttack
summary:
Billiards and platforming combine for a unique puzzling adventure!

Cleverly crafted indie platform puzzler #SinucaAttack arrives on console, bringing its unique blend of pool ball physics and 2D platforming to new players worldwide. Choose your character, customize your cue stick and leap into a series of fast-paced room escape puzzles where pool balls are your greatest weapons.

With each room you enter, challenges get increasingly complex, introducing new stage gimmicks to manipulate and obstacles to overcome. Ricochet your shots off the floor, ceiling and walls to activate switches and open doors. Even use jet packs to reach new heights as stages go vertical! But watch out for pitfalls, and be careful not to trap yourself inside!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Enlightenment Era
summary: The Enlightenment Era, The Century of Lights, The Age of Reason. Those are but a few names people have dubbed the Eighteenth Century, one hundred years that pushed the world into the direction of scientific and social progress. A mod for Civilization V that fleshes out the midgame with a new era featuring new technologies, units, and more.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 19: The Renai Simulation - Watashi ni Oma Cafe
summary:
Simple 2000 Series Vol. 019: The Renai Simulation - Renai Kissa Watashi ni Oma Cafe is a mix between a simulation and an adventure game.

The game begins when the parents of the main character shuffle died in a car accident, so now he is left in charge of the family coffee shop. The game now got some different part since the player has to manage the eatery and the waitresses, all of whom are lovely and potential love interests. During each week he has to decide about the coffee shop menus, the prices, what will be the waitress duties during that week and also what he is going to do that week (he can study management, rest, etc.). There are some times during each week that the player is giving some choices (like in all visual novel adventures) and depending of them the game ending will be different. If he got success he can buy new coffee shops, new waitress dresses, etc.

name: SinSeed
summary:
SinSeed is a battle royale game with no time limits. 
 
An island awaits you that you will fight endlessly. 
 
A never-ending battle royale game, you are the only one to rule this world! 
Think of a battle royale game, when you face off against thousands of online players and rule the kingdom, you are now their worst enemy. 
 
Start with the character class that's right for you. 
 
Defeat enemies and survive on SinSeed island! 
 
Upgrade your items, be the King, rule the island.

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: Play for Poland
summary: DLS makes it possible to play for Poland

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 55: The Darts
summary: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 55: The Darts features a complete 3d simulation of the darts sport with game modes like 301, 501, cricket, etc. The game uses the analog stick for a more realistic simulation.

name: Sinking the Boats
summary: It's a choice-oriented story game. Play as a group of underground workers who fight in the dark, and stage a treacherous spy war story in Nanjing during World War II. How will you respond to identity crises, betrayals, and collapsed beliefs? Loyalty or betrayal, abandon others or be abandoned...

name: Sift Heads World: Act 3 - Alonzo's Reinforcement
summary: It looks like Vinnie, Kiro and Shorty won't get a chance to rest. After facing the Yakuza, our "heroes" are suddenly attacked by Alonzo, the trio's greatest enemy, who has returned after his mysterious disappearance - and this time armed with a powerful bionic arm to replace the one he had lost.

name: Siege Worlds
summary:
Join up to 4 players and fight as a team to prevent an attack by hordes of undead and monsters. Connect your DiviGo wallet to earn Divi rewards, can you make it to the end of the wave alive?

Battle as historical characters, or build your own. With many options to chose from, every squad is unique. Build your character, assemble your squad, and repel the hordes.

name: Silly Sync
summary: In Silly Sync, one move controls all characters at once. Plan carefully—use obstacles to your advantage and deliver each character to the goal.

name: Simple FPS Platformer
summary: Simple FPS Platformer is a first person platformer where you can play a selection of levels and make the best time or create and share your levels.

name: Silent Ops
summary: Join a secret organization that is present everywhere, protecting us from the invisible threat of the 21st century. They use only the best agents and modern technology, but they are not the only ones. Another very influential group intends to use advanced cloning to implement their sinister plans, which can have global consequences for humanity.

name: Silmar
summary:
Silmar is a rogue-like/hack type of RPG, with random generated dungeons, in which you as an adventurer are descending to fight monsters and find treasure. The game was first released for DOS around 1990, with later incarnations running on Windows, Linux and OS/X.

The DOS version has tile-based graphics, and was split in three parts. The first (Dungeons of Silmar) was distributed as shareware, and the second (An Everpresent Magic) and third (The Forward Terminus) parts were made available with the purchase of the first part.

The story is that the evil wizard Syrilboltus was defeated in a war with a dwarf country called Gormarundon, but left a cursed magic labyrinth of dungeons under his tower, crawling with monsters, nearby the village Silmarii, which needs to be cleansed and sealed by reaching the bottom of the dungeons. Many adventurers have tried but failed, and now you are to try your luck.

You choose your character from a list of mixed characters, ranging from werewolves to baseball players (oh, the horror!), and venture forth. As is usual with these games, there is a shop in the village above where you can purchase necessities and sell any treasure you find below. You can reach the shop by using a teleport bead, so there is a quick way out if things get too hot below.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Stellar Phenomena
summary:
The ever-expanding conflicts within and between the TEC, Vasari, and Advent have pushed the battlegrounds into uncharted space. The sectors now being drawn into the war feature the most dangerous and powerful natural phenomena in the galaxy.

Exploit what resources remain in these dangerous sectors while you can. The uncharted depths of space hold threats beyond any natural phenomenon, and not all of them wait to be explored.

name: Simple FPS Aim Trainer
summary: An FPS Aim Trainer for fast and lightweight target practice with built in game sensitivity conversion and matching, easily switch between popular games to match your mouse sensitivity

name: Silly Survivors
summary: Silly Survivors — a casual, pared-down roguelike where you play as an adorable but fiercely determined furry fox, armed with… a flashlight! Your mission is simple: survive waves of suspiciously silly ghosts who keep trying to get close (and pull some kind of silly stuff). Light is your main weapon.

name: Sinister Outbreak
summary: Sinister Outbreak is an action-horror game where you wake up in a zombie-infested lab. With no memory and danger around every corner, fight to survive, uncover the truth, and escape the nightmare.

name: SIMP: Super Infection Massive Pathology
summary: SIMP is an exciting microscopic roguelite shooter. Guide Gaylord to rescue his fiancée Zoe from the creatures of the immune system, using an arsenal of organic weapons and unique abilities.

name: Simple Zombie Survival
summary: A wave-based FPS for 1–4 players, made with passion by one dude! Pick your load out, mow down hordes, Roast Mr Hotdog and earn cash. Spin Vegas-style slots (random box) between waves for upgrades, compete for the best score, and see if your luck (and skill) can keep you standing. Can you survive?

name: Sintesoft 2.0
summary: Compilation of 20 interactive educational applications, including chess, jigsaw puzzle, concentration and truco.

name: SightLineVR
summary: The laws of physics ensure that your perception of the world stays consistent. But what if those laws were broken? You'll find yourself in a surreal world where everything changes the moment you look away.

name: Side Pocket
summary: The Game Boy version of Side Pocket is significantly different from the NES version, featuring a smaller playing field (to compensate with Game Boy's screen), simplified physics and a different screen layout. Like in NES version, the Pocket Game mode features 4 levels and the player starts with 5 lives. One unique addition to the Game Boy version is the ability to play single-player nine-ball mode, while in other versions this mode is limited only to two players.

name: Silver Thread: Episode Three
summary:
Do ghosts actually exist?

An exorcist that doubts the existence of ghost might sound contradictory but to Alicia Wilkershire, this is the right way to get closer to the truth. A client's mother claims to be haunted but after sensing something nefarious behind it, Alicia rushed to investigate.

name: Simpson's Car Parking
summary: The game Simpsons Car Parking you will meet again with the famous Simpson. This time, he finished the road courses and take an examination in the discipline Parking. Since Simpson motorist – beginner, then it turns out not really to park the car in the right place. Help our hero of the famous Simpson properly parked his car. Be careful in the management!

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 18: The Party Sugoroku
summary: Twenty 2 Party is a fun underwater adventure for you and your friends! Explore the depths of the ocean in this fun interactive game that will involve you and your friends in thrilling challenges for the ultimate treasure.

name: SimCity Creator
summary: SimCity Creator follows the basic SimCity formula that sees players managing a city and placing residential, commercial, and industrial zones for buildings in addition to facilities such as police stations, hospitals, seaports, and stadiums. Players are also able to customize the look of their buildings by choosing from several themes for the city such as Egyptian, Roman, Japanese, European, Las Vegas, and near-future styles, in addition to ones that result in a crystal or confectionery-like appearance to buildings. Players are also able to tour their city, rendered in 3D graphics, in a helicopter or airplane. If the player builds an airport, more touring vehicles can be unlocked.

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
summary: A video game based on the film, titled Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas, was released on August 21, 2003. Published by Atari and developed by Small Rockets, it was released for PC.

name: SimCopter
summary: SimCopter lets players explore SimCity 2000 environments from a helicopter pilot's perspective. Players respond to various emergencies across custom or pre-made cities, including fires, bank robberies, and medical evacuations. The game integrates with emergency services, allowing players to coordinate with police, fire departments, and ambulances while completing missions in their aircraft.

name: Silky Winds
summary: A Serene Journey Through a Stylized Eastern Landscape

name: SimEarth: The Living Planet
summary:
The most ambitious and far-reaching of Maxis’ Sim lineage, Sim Earth puts you in charge of an entire planet throughout its 10 billion year lifespan. Your ultimate task is to guide the planet’s inhabitants into the stars, from its humble single-celled roots.

The main threats you face include pollution, disease, famine, war and global warming. The controls available to you include the chance to move mountains and continents, creating different levels of species, and unleash tidal waves and earthquakes so as to reshape your planet. All of these things take from your limited energy, which must be replenished.

name: SimEarth: The Living Planet
summary:
SimEarth is a planet simulator - a model of a planet. It is a game, an educational toy, and an enjoyable tool. With SimEarth you can take over many included planets, or design and create your own.

SimEarth treats the planet as a whole: life climate the atmosphere, and the planet itself - from dirt and rock to the molton core - all affect on each other.
You will see your planet as a whole - from a satellite's point of view, at two levels of magnification.

SimEarth can be played in two modes: game and experimental. In game mode, you will try to develop, manage, and preserve your planet within allotted energy budgets.
In experimental mode, you are given enlimited energy to mold your planet. This allows you to set up any stage of development, and then introduce any new factors you want and see what happens. In this mode SimEarth is a "planetary spreadsheet."

Your SimEarth planets will be poulates by electronic life-forms called SimEarthlings. Sim Earthlings range from single-celled plants and animals to intellegent species.
Intellegent Simearthlings are not limited to Humans - or even Mammals. There can be intellegent Dinosaur SimEarthlings, intellegent Mollusk SimEarthlings, even intellegent Insects SimEarthlings - but only one intellegent life-form at a time. A single planet can be populated by billions of SimEarthling. Their welfare is in your hands.

name: SimEarth: The Living Planet
summary: An entire planet becomes your laboratory in this large-scale simulation game. Players help foster new life and promote its evolution into life forms of higher intelligence. Guide civilization along the path of evolution until it can achieve Exodus, the ultimate goal of settling on another planet. The basic challenge of the game is to maintain a comfortable environment for the life forms by adjusting atmospheric and geological parameters. Small organisms called Prokaryote and Trichordate will grow and evolve into a multitude of life forms. Making a drastic change is a recipe for disaster.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Outlaw Sectors
Sina
summary: Made by Triunfo Game Studios, Sina is an action-adventure game with soulslike elements. With a great focus on its story, scenario development, and fluid combat, this game provides a memorable experience for anyone who dares to challenge their fate.

name: Sisyphus Simulator
summary: A casual, incremental clicker based on the famous Greek myth. Roll up an infinite mountain, earning money to unlock upgrades and decorations for your customizable boulder!

name: Sierra Ops: Episode 4 - Cadence of the Morning Star
summary:
Sierra Ops Episode 4: Cadence of the Morning Star is the final part of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces.
Is it even possible to end this war without losing everything?

With the released of episode 4, “New Game +” mode will be unlocked and playable with any save that has reached any one of the normal endings of the game.
...Will this time be different? One can only wonder.

name: Sin Zero
summary: Fast-paced, melee action game where the ground beneath you is just as dangerous as the enemies ahead. Armed with a katana—and any other deadly weapon you may find—you’ll slash your way through relentless waves of foes to survive.

name: Sisters: Last Day of Summer
summary: A fully-animated visual novel about a boy who wakes up in an unknown house with two beautiful sisters, their mother, and an unspoken truth.

name: Sit-Back Attack
summary:
Sit-Back and Relax while the game grinds for you!
It is an Idle RPG WITHOUT any MTX!

Features 60+ different classes, 500+ different skills, unlimited amount of build options to help make the team of 4 heroes you control defeat over 300 monsters!

A very in-depth interface that allows you to see every facet of battle, stats, and more to help you decide how to make your team even stronger!

All classes have unique character art and their own skills, strengths, and weaknesses.

You can choose from 1 of 4 pets to help bolster your team and you control when it uses it's special attack.

An alchemy craft that allows you to use potions on your allies and enemies manually! This craft can be improved with a characters skills and gear.

So much more!

name: Single Scoop
summary: Scoot and shoot to the finish line in this action puzzle game. Time your button press to advance towards the goal. Navigate through a maze of patterns and build your combo meter to break the rules.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Ethiopia Pack
summary: Introduces the Ethiopia civilization with Menelik II, the Oromo Cavalry unique unit, and the Rock-Hewn Church tile improvement.

name: Siegius
summary: Become the Roman Legion, the Gallic tribes, or a group of wild boars in this tactic game! Defend the Roman empire, lead an assault on Rome, or do whatever boars do, it's your choice.

name: Silent Cleaning
summary: Move silently. Clean thoroughly. A 3D horror action and cleaning simulation featuring Kao’s real products. Clean the villa, solve hidden puzzles, and escape while your performance affects the home’s appraisal value. A unique blend of suspense and cleaning awaits.

name: Silent Storm: Sentinels
summary: The add-on Sentinels starts shortly after the WWII nightmare. Veterans from all countries, even former enemies, stand together and form the secret investigation and intervention group “Sentinels”, for one purpose only: To stop the evil secret society “Thor's Hammer” they have faced in war.

name: Six Legends
summary:
Six Legends is a narrative point & click game with a few minigames.
It tells the story of six young dragons, exploring forbidden parts of the world around them, and slowly changing how their own world works.
Play as all six characters as they go through friendships and life-changing encounters, in a journey of self-discovery and growth.

name: Siren Forest
summary: Their final known location was within the eerie Siren Forest, as recorded in an ancient sheepskin scroll. This forgotten woodland holds an air of mystery and intrigue...

name: Six Sides Of Obscurity
summary: Six sides of obscurity is a story-based RPG that you can play solo or with a team of up to 4 players. You will have endless build possibilities. Creating a character, increasing passive and active abilities according to class, producing equipment, adding tactical bonuses and runes, etc.

name: Simultaneous Control
summary: Move two cats at the same time: one character with normal movement control, and one character with inverted movement control. Besides controlling both characters, you must search for a key to open the gate and complete each level!

name: Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon
Since November
summary:
What are you doing with your time on Earth? Are you happy? Stay inside. We have pizza.

"Since November" is a short furry visual novel with about 12k words and four endings. It is written to be conclusive, so there will be no additional chapters. It is a game that was developed for the NovemBear 2024 Furry Visual Novel Jam.

name: Silenced
summary: Crossing the Kingdom destroyed by the "devil" and using wisdom to defeat the enemy like the tide But can ordinary people really do it? Does an uncelebrated adventure really make sense? Anyway, this quiet adventure on the road to death has quietly begun.

name: Sicko Sanctum
summary: Sicko Sanctum is a score-attack boomer shooter hybrid that owns character action merchandise. Snag upgrades and some skill, keep battlin' till you get a high score that makes you feel like you've had just a neat little time playing the game :)

name: Silent Express
summary: In this 4-player online co-op horror game, you embark on an adventure by summoning a mysterious train. You must find and defuse bombs in an 8-carriage train. However, beware, there's a blind conductor and dangerous creatures chasing you. Race against time, find the bombs, and survive!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: The Complete Edition
summary:
Sid Meier's Civilization V: The Complete Edition
This edition includes the base game Civilization V and all major expansions and downloadable content (DLC). Players lead a civilization from the earliest times through the modern era, managing warfare, diplomacy, technology, and culture.

Included content:

Gods & Kings expansion
Brave New World expansion
Scrambled Nations Map Pack
Scrambled Continents Map Pack
Explorer’s Map Pack
Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Mesopotamia
Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Asia
Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Mediterranean
Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Americas
Scenarios such as Spain and Inca, Polynesia and more

name: Siege of Dungeon
summary: “Siege of Dungeon” is a strategic rogue-lite game, where players challenge strong, cunning monsters within a limited time by combining relics and skills to build up your team. What’s waiting for you deep down in the dungeon? Could it be a rare and precious treasure, or the beginning of despair...?

name: Silver and Blood
summary: A dark fantasy unfurls across the medieval continent of Minexus. With high-quality anime-style cutscenes, striking skill animations, and a distinct gothic aesthetic, Silver and Blood unravels the mystery behind its name.
